titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4,8-dicyclohexyl -6--2,10-dimethyl -12 H-dibenzo[d,g][1,3,2]-dioxaphosphocin).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4,8-dicyclohexyl -6--2,10-dimethyl -12 H-dibenzo[d,g][1,3,2]-dioxaphosphocin).
